page.title: 01GENERAL SUMMARY
page.content: Most of our area is farmland.It is mainly dairy farming.However,cereal crops such as wheat,corn and barley are grown;strawberries,raspberries,and blackberries are retailed;sheep,pigs, hens and beef cattle are reared;plants and shrubs are sold for gardens;cider- apple orhards are also to be found. Quite a lot of people in Taunton own horses and one farm is used to provide homes for owners with little land. In our area we have many villages: Cheddon Fitzpaine, Creech St Michael, Monkton Heathfield,West Monkton,Creech Heathfield and Bathpool.There are also a number of hamlets such as Langaller, Goosenford and Overton. Although it is only a few miles from the busy town of Taunton it is a very peaceful community.There are many old people which is probably the reason why it is so quiet.
